position.title: Visual Product Designer
position.description: We're looking for a Visual Product Designer to change the way we access digital services. Youâ€™ll be collaborating with product and engineering teams to design and implement multiple web and mobile apps.
responsibilities: Work with the product team and partners to transform ideas and designs into great products.
Work with the engineering, design, and product teams collaboratively, contributing ideas that add value to our product roadmap and company goals.
Design useful user interfaces which are easy to understand by applying accessibility standards, usability best practices, and insights from cognitive psychology.
Create a visual language and illustrations for various communication/marketing channels.
Develop visual and interaction standards such as style guide and design system for Privado products.
Collaborate with the team on the value-proposition and user journeys.
Translate user flows into interactive prototypes and create design specifications for development.
skills: 4-5 years experience working preferably in tech startups.
Working knowledge of web technologies (HTML/CSS), responsive web design, and mobile app design guidelines.
Experience of translating user flows into interactive prototypes and creating design specifications for development.
Good understanding of accessibility, usability and typographic best practices.
The ability to apply the UI design libraries (such as Art Design).
Create illustrations, iconography, and infographics to visualise product concepts and for marketing purposes.
Develop visual language and interaction standards such as style guide and maintain the design system.
Write microcopy to guide users through UI.
Proficient in the use of design tools such as Figma and Sketch.
Proficient in both spoken and written English to communicate with team members and explain the Privado project to the world.
niceToHave:
Experienced working in projects using cryptography, complex maths and complex database structures.

Experienced in designing blockchain architectures.
Familiar with existing L2 blockchain solutions.
Familiar with Zero-Knowledge algorithms.
Familiar with devOps stack.
